    Setting hosts Get data
  • Changelog

Function reference

Create and set

create_gitstats()
Create a GitStats object
set_github_host()
Set GitHub host
set_gitlab_host()
Set GitLab host
is_verbose()
Is verbose mode switched on
verbose_off()
Switch off verbose mode
verbose_on()
Switch on verbose mode
show_orgs()
Show organizations set in GitStats

Get data

get_R_package_usage()
Get information on package usage across repositories
get_commits()
Get information on commits
get_commits_stats()
Get statistics on commits
get_files()
Get files content
get_release_logs()
Get release logs
get_repos()
Get information on repositories
get_users()
Get users data
